results.title: Power train
results.creator_credit: Teru Murakami, George Dunning, Films/West and Industrial Animation Films
results.brief_description: This animated program explains the workings of the automotive transmission system. Reveals the need for and the mechanics of each major component: clutch, gearbox, universal joint, drive shaft and differential.

results.title: Wir Stellen Uns Vor
results.brief_description: Designed for students of elementary German. Consists of three self contained documentary film sequences showing young Germans using simple language in authentic exchanges from their everyday lives.

results.title: A Hard day's night
results.creator_credit: Richard Lester, Walter Shenson and United Artists Corporation
results.brief_description: Starring the Beatles, this comic fantasia with music uses a multitude of cinematic gags. An enormous commercial success, it led directly to all the kaleidescope swinging London spy thrillers and comedies of the late sixties. In this film the Beatles, harrased by their manager and Paul’s grandpa, embark from Liverpool by train for a London television show.

results.title: Martin Luther King Jnr. - 2nd edition
results.creator_credit: Chuck Olin Associates and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Documentary footage is used to trace Martin Luther King’s involvement in the Black Civil Rights movement in the USA from the early sixties to his assasination in 1968. No other credits available.

results.title: Testing, testing
results.brief_description: Introduces the behind the scenes work done by scientific testers in Britain prior to placement of products on the market. Shows amongst others the tests done on custard powder, petrol tankers, tonic water, fly killer, vacuum cleaners and grass.

results.title: Coaching for the first time
results.creator_credit: Ron Tindall and Dep for Youth, Sport and Recreation, Western Australia
results.brief_description: Provides an overview of what is involved for the newcomer to coaching child athletes. Stresses that winning isn’t everything. Considers the role of the parent as a coach and finally highlights the skills necessary to be a good coach.

results.title: Sur mer et sur terre etc.
results.brief_description: Five French language programmes taken in location in and arround Fecamp and Potiers: 1. “Sur mer et sur terre”. 2. “Par les rues”. 3. “Chemin faisant”. 4. “Ecole, travail, familie”. 5. Loisirs”.

results.title: Rendez-vous France. Episodes 1-5
results.creator_credit: Sue Weeks, Susan Paton and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: A series of five french language programs based on the adventures of the Keravec family on holiday in Cancale, Brittany. Provides elementary french language and gives an insight into many aspects of life in France. The individual titles indicate the content of each program: “Chez Keravec”, “Les surprises” “Une ombre du passe”, “Les choux-fleurs de Saint-Brieuc”, “La chasse a mort”.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sue Weeks, Susan Paton and British Broadcasting Corporation

results.title: Treffpunkt Deutschland. Episodes 1-5
results.creator_credit: John Thomas, John Billingham and BBC
results.brief_description: A compilation tape of five programmes designed to help students in their second or third year of learning German. The programmes are built around everyday experiences of some German teenagers and are entirely in German. A simple linking commentary repeats and reinforces the most useful language used. Individual titles indicate content of each program.
